009package Ch09_AutomaticThresholding;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.askForSampleImage;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.threshold.global.GlobalThresholder;
020import imagingbook.common.threshold.global.MaxEntropyThresholder;
021import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
022
023/**
024 * <p>
025 * ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the {@link MaxEntropyThresholder} class.
026 * See Sec. 9.1.5 of [1] for additional details.
027 * </p>
028 * <p>
029 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 
030 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
031 * </p>
032 * 
033 * @author WB
034 * @version 2022/04/02
035 * @see imagingbook.common.threshold.global.MaxEntropyThresholder
036 */
037public class Global_MaxEntropy implements PlugInFilter {
038        
039        /**
040         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
041         * is currently open.
042         */
043        public Global_MaxEntropy() {
044                if (noCurrentImage()) {
045                        askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
046                }
047        }
048        
049        @Override
050        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
051                return DOES_8G;
052        }
053        
054        @Override
055        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
056                ByteProcessor bp = (ByteProcessor) ip;
057                
058                GlobalThresholder thr = new MaxEntropyThresholder();
059                int q = thr.getThreshold(bp);
060                if (q >= 0) {
061                        IJ.log("threshold = " + q);
062                        ip.threshold(q);
063                }
064                else {
065                        IJ.showMessage("no threshold found");
066                }
067        }
068}
